column1: <meta name="description" content="mathcentre has been established to deliver mathematics support materials, free of charge, to both university professionals and students.It aims to provide students with an opportunity to study important areas of pre-university mathematics which they may have studied before, but which may have been forgotten.">

<meta name="keywords" content="mathcentre, revision, revise, practice, guides, algebra, arithmetic, complex numbers, differentiation, drug dose calculations, finance, functions and graphs, geometry, graphs for health sciences, guides & case studies, integration, matrices, mechanics, numeracy skills, sequences & series, statistics, trigonometry, vectors">
<title>mathematics support resources for staff and students - mathcentre</title>
For the help you need to support your course

column8: Students : self-study resources targetted to the needs of your individual courses.
Staff : generic mathematics support and study materials for use with your students.

column2: What help and maths resources are available?

mathcentre offers students quick reference guides, practice and revision materials, video tutorials, workbooks and online practice exercises on many branches of mathematics, including: Algebra, Arithmetic, Complex Numbers, Differentiation, Drug dose calculations, Finance, Functions and Graphs, Geometry, Graphs for health sciences, Guides & Case Studies, Integration, Matrices, Mechanics, Numeracy Skills, Sequences & Series, Statistics, Trigonometry and Vectors.
